mapper.select: SELECT CAL_NO, CAL_CATEGORY, CAL_TITLE, CAL_CONTENT, CAL_WRITER, CAL_START, CAL_END, CAL_REGDATE, CAL_MODIFY, CAL_DELFLAG, CAL_BIGO FROM CALENDAR
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALENDAR (CAL_NO, CAL_CATEGORY, CAL_TITLE, CAL_CONTENT, CAL_WRITER, CAL_START, CAL_END, CAL_DELFLAG) SELECT NVL(MAX(CAL_NO) + 1, 0) AS CAL_NO, #{cal_category}, #{cal_title}, #{cal_content}, #{cal_writer}, #{cal_start}, #{cal_end}, 'N' FROM CALENDAR
